links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: a(n)=16*a(n-1), n>0 ; a(0)=8 . G.f.: 8/(1-16x). [From _Philippe Del√©ham_, Nov 23 2008]
prog: (Sage) [lucas_number1(4*n, 2, 0) for n in xrange(1, 17)] # [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Oct 27 2009](MAGMA) [2^(4*n+3): n in [0..20]]; // Vincenzo Librandi, Jun 27 2011(PARI) a(n)=8<<(4*n) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 08 2012
